import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./header.css"; const Header = () => { window.addEventListener("scroll", function () { const scrollup = document.querySelector(".scrollup"); // when the scroll is higher than 560 viewport height, add the show-scroll class to a tag with the scroll-top class if (this.scrollY >= 560) scrollup.classList.add("show-scroll"); else scrollup.classList.remove("show-scroll"); }); // =================== Toggle Menu ================= const [Toggle, showMenu] = useState(false); return (

); } export default Header
